content.description: Blue portal that transfers users across the many Valleys of Yield and Principal
A green portal signifies balance in all things
A red portal signifies strife and battle
Blood river that is shown to those with a future of battle or strife
Blood river that is shown to those with a future of battle or strife
Sunrise across Principal Valley to signify a new light and journey
Clear skies signal peace and tranquility
Soothing skies belie unknown futures
The skies simmer with soothing green vapors
Soothing vapors expand into the vast ether of existence
The skies glimmer with mysterious purple vapors
Elves whose kin have been exposed to the deep blue waters of the Sea of Liquidity bear a blue tinge
The skin of Elfis whose generations have spent their time among the trees of the Forests of Yield has become green
The icy peaks of the Bearish Mountains are said to be home to Elfis whose skin is paler than snow
Exposure to the red arid soil of the Bullish Valleys has made the skin of each new generation become slightly more pink
Red Elves are believed to be descendants of the Ancestral Degens, whose skin was tempered by the fiery forges of the Degen Inferno
Yellow elves are believed to be descendants of the Ancient Proposers, whose rules of governance still guide to this day
Clothes worn by nobility on diplomatic events. Blue represents liquidity and mastery of diplomacy
Full-body armor made of magical quartz. Movement is somewhat restricted, but it’s highly protective against Degen magics
Ritualistic attire comes to life as individual facets intertwine both moonlight and campfire
Made from a fabric of magically-treated quartz, these robes are said to amplify their wearer’s magical output
Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its blue color is obtained from Liquidity Flowers, found near all kinds of shores
A hardened exoskeleton of armor readies you for battle. You feel empowered and weightless
This quartz-infused suit hardens you for battle. You feel lighter when wearing it
This tight-fitting outfit is reserved for night-time missions, as sunlight tends to damage leather
Full-body armor made with the scales of ancient dragons. Although said to still roam the land, nobody has seen them since the fall of Mount Qogs
A hardened exoskeleton of armor readies you for battle. You feel empowered and impervious to heat
This quartz-infused suit hardens you for battle. You also feel unaffected by heat
These straps aid with farming even in unwelcoming conditions, raising untapped potential from the earth
This tight-fitting outfit is reserved for night-time missions, as sunlight tends to damage leather
Clothes worn by nobility on diplomatic events. Yellow is both opulent and ostentatious
Full-body armor made of gold and worn by elite warriors. The magical quartz infused in it makes it lighter than fabric
A hardened exoskeleton of armor readies you for battle. You feel empowered and elegant
This quartz-infused suit hardens you for battle. You’ll go to any lengths to follow orders
Straps glisten as gold under the harsh sunlight, energizing those who wear them
This tight-fitting outfit is reserved for night-time missions, as sunlight tends to damage leather. It gives off a particular shine, as if emitting its own light
Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its green color is obtained from the peels of Yield Fruits, which thrive during the summer
Clothes worn by nobility on diplomatic events. Red used to represent the Degen faction, but now is worn by all
Traditional ritualistic attire favored by warriors as well as researchers innovating novel farming methods
Dyed with the crushed powder of their enemies’ bones, only the most crazen Degen wear them
Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its red color is obtained from the leaves of Copium plants, commonly found on the Bearish Mountains
Infused with the magical properties of moonlight, these robes are said to improve the effects of healing magics
Light clothing, good for fast travel. The white color is reserved for explorers who have proven themselves in the Degen Trials
Traditional ritualistic attire whose yellow color symbolizes the sharing of wisdom
Made from a fabric of woven gold, these robes allow their wearer to channel the power of the sun much more effectively
Light clothing, good for fast travel. Its yellow color is obtained from the golden sands of the deserts of Etcal
Dark straps provide flexibility and function for all kinds of tasks
Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Blue in color, often worn by scholarly individuals
Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Green in color, often worn by those who experiment with farming
Long hair worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Blue like the depth of the Sea of Liquidity
Unruly blue hair is characteristic of the most profound researchers in arcane types of liquidity
Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent
Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Green like the spoils of a fresh harvest
Elven hair that grows wild and untamed is a sign of raw magical potential
Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent
Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style
Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Grey in color, often worn by those who have a way with words
Long hair tied in a bun, to combat the heat of labour. Red in color, often worn by those who possess great stamina
Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Red is favored by those quick to action
Wild red hair like the color of battle makes others wary, for good reason or not
Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent
Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style
Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. White with wisdom and ancient knowledge
Untamed white hair channels the wisdom of the Ancients
Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent
Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style
Long hair worn worn loosely as if unconcerned with worldly matters. Yellow is a mark of status but also of greed
Chaotic golden locks symbolize great power over others, how it’s used remains to be seen
Styled in the latest fashion, the wearer’s care and attention to detail is apparent
Short hair is less frivolous and more practical, showing a focus on substance over style
